reviewText: I remember visiting some of these places in my youth and now I feel like I was just there again- how exhilarating!  But aside from my personal connection to these gorgeous mountains, I use this video as goal-setting tool.  If you want strenuous workouts with rewarding vistas at the summit, this is your choice.  As a bonus, the fall colors are nice along June Lake and the addition of natural wonders such as Devils Postpile are a plus.  Eastern Sierra Hillclimbs?  Yes!
